Class Crud_mongo

java.lang.Object
databases.Crud_mongo
public class Crud_mongo
extends java.lang.Object
Contains all the crud operation that could be done on MongoDB.

    • createReview

      public void createReview​(java.lang.String points, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String description, java.lang.String taster_name, java.lang.String taster_twitter_handle, int price, java.lang.String designation, java.lang.String variety, java.lang.String region_1, java.lang.String region_2, java.lang.String province, java.lang.String country, java.lang.String winery)
      Create a new review inside review collection.
      Parameters:
      points - : the score that user give for a certain wine;
      title - : title of the reivew;
      description - : the body of the review;
      taster_name - : user's name;
      taster_twitter_handle - : user twitter nickname;
      price - : wine's price that has been reviewed;
      designation - : wine's name;
      variety - : wine's typology;
      region_1 - : region's origin;
      region_2 - : region's origin;
      province - : province's origin of the wine;
      country - : winery's origin country;
      winery - : name of the winery that produces the wine.
